content.question: The map indicates the spread of the red fire ant after its initial entrance into the United States at the port of Mobile, Alabama, in the 1930s. Discuss TWO environmental factors that might have determined the pattern of fire ant invasion.

frqParts.text: The map indicates the spread of the red fire ant after its initial entrance into the United States at the port of Mobile, Alabama, in the 1930s. Discuss TWO environmental factors that might have determined the pattern of fire ant invasion.

skill.text: 1.C: Explain biological concepts and processes in applied contexts.
